title: Photoshop 2016 Cracked, easy install, multi language
description:
Adobe Photoshop CS 6 (becouse this software is way to expencive to pay for)

The installation looks hard, follow it step by step and you're fine.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- CLOSE YOUR INTERNET CONNECTION (IMPORTANT)
- first disable anti virus (the crack gives a false positive)
- In the crack folder run 'setup 1' & 'setup 2'.
- In the Adobe CS6 folder run 'Set-up'

- Ignore imminent restart warning
- Select your language. (You can not change it after installation)
- Start a trial version
- After install Close the program (IMPORTANT)

- navigate to your Program Files and/or your Program Files (x86) and find the Adobe folder
- Find the 'amtlib.dll' file and delete it.
- Navigate back to the torrent and locate the cracked dll folder
- Copy the 64-bit .dll file into your Program Files directory (where you deleted the file)
- If needed, repeat for the 32-bit .dll file
- Back at the torrent, run the updater
  (Double click on "AdobePatchInstaller.exe" in the folder
   "Photoshop_CS6_13_0_1_update" to update version 13.0.1)
- you can restart. (and put internet back on again)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you have any questions please ask here, 

If installation worked wy not seed is for a wile so others can use it to
